attributes.action: give the money to the public rather than the banks
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Rather than give the banks 37 billion if you gave every tax paying member of thde public £300000.00 they would spend the money paying of debts and creating jobs.The gov could tax them on the money so it would not cost them as much and you would be a hero.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
